revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=JCG |model=JHR-N926R |fcc_date=07/09/2012 |asin=B008EOZVUI |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Yichen Technology |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HHOYC002 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052;RT3052F; |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032N90TFI04 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H57V2562GTR-60C |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052;RT3052F; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=schematics |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=JCG-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^JCG-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:4B |oui_eth=00:E0:4B }} '''300Mbps High Power Wireless Router'''
[http://jcgcom.com/products/35/1.aspx Product page] :[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/jcg-jhr-n926r-300mbps-high-power-wireless-n-router-2606 On '''SpeedGuide''']
The FCC test report lists the following additional models as covered by this FCC ID.. *[[JCG JHR-N926R]] *JCG JHR-N936R *JCG JHR-N946R *JCG JHR-N956R *JCG JHR-N966R *JCG JHR-976R *JCG JHR-986R *JCG JHR-996R
Default settings are per the FCC label. :The default SSID pattern appears to be '''JCG-XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the BSSID (upper case letters).
Per the FCC documents (and supporting WiGLE data), the 00:E0:4B OUI is presumed to be used.
===JTAG=== On SMD resistors: R21 (TDO), R23 (TMS), R22 (TDI), R24 (TCLK), R27 (TRST)
===Serial=== VCC, TX, GND, RX
__NOTOC__
